abstract: Justice Matthew J D’Emic of State Supreme Court in Brooklyn overturns double murder conviction of Wayne Martin after prosecutors say exculpatory evidence was withheld; district attorney's office will continue to investigate case and may eventually retry Martin.
lead_paragraph: Justice Matthew J. D’Emic threw out the guilty verdict against Wayne Martin after prosecutors said exculpatory evidence in the case had been withheld.

headline.main: Brooklyn Judge Overturns Man’s Conviction in 2005 Double Murder

snippet: Justice Matthew J. D’Emic threw out the guilty verdict against Wayne Martin after prosecutors said exculpatory evidence in the case had been withheld....
